name: MDG: Matrix Defense Gauntlet
description:
Your ship is ready. The course plotted. It was supposed to be easy... just map the far regions of space. No one knew the course would take you through a hostile galaxy.
And now you're being attacked on all sides, with nothing but your Digital Gun Turret System, or DGTS... to fend off the hostile entities that threaten the success of your mission. How long will you be able to hold out before you're overwhelmed?
